short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows photos in stories on the Experience Project uncropped.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension changes the way stories are displayed on The Experience Project (http://www.experienceproject.com/). It extracts the background image of story titles and inserts it uncropped at the top of the story.
